item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 3rd April
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE NEEDED PLEASE TEMPORARY FILL IN FOOTWAY POTHOLE FROM BOLLARD MISSING AND REMOVE BARRIERS WHICH ARE ALWAYS KNOCKDOWN TO MAKE SAFE I WILL RAISE AN ENQUIRIE WITH AHR FOR REINSTATEMENT OF NEW BOLLARD TODAY 700x600x80mm I have put barriers back up but some are broken (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 3rd April
item.description:
We are furious to turn up at our property 32 upper park street Cheltenham to find an ugly post with sign placed directly in front of our house, not only is it ugly it is unnecessary, also whoever installed these posts clearly have no consideration for what this looks like for our properties or common sense as to where to position them! There is a sign on the lamppost 4 houses up it is really overkill in our opinion. How about sticking them all along the fronts of the houses on the other side of the road and see what reception you would get from those neighbours.! There is also a lamppost across the road that you could have used! I am emailing you to advise that we are considering reinstating the front door as you can see the outline in the paint where it was before so you will need to remove this post and if not we will have to remove it ourselves!
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Water leak, 3rd April
item.description:
The leakage is on manor road just before manor court and has been like this for nearly 16 months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
